keyPolicies.policyTitle: A 'time to care' fund to save the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will bring health and social care together and invest in 8,000 doctors and 20,000 nurses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: No more police cuts in London
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will scrap Police and Crime Commissioners and put the money back into front line policing.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Build affordable homes and provide help to renters
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will guarantee longer term tenancies for private renters, ban rip-off letting agent fees and build 200,000 new homes by 2020.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackle low pay and exploitative zero hour contracts
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will raise the minimum wage, offer tax breaks to promote the living wage and ban exploitative zero hour contracts.
Labour will fix the broken energy market, increasing competition and transparency.

issues.health: Labour will bring health and social care together and invest in 8,000 doctors and 20,000 nurses.

housing.content: Labour will guarantee longer term tenancies for private renters, ban rip-off letting agent fees and build 200,000 new homes by 2020.

images.caption: Karen Buck was in your local area today
